statements: DELETE FROM drug_development_progress WHERE project_name = 'Clinical Trials Project';
DELETE FROM drug_development_progress WHERE project_id = 101 AND phase1_end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM drug_development_progress WHERE project_name = 'TrialXYZ' AND (phase2_end_date IS NULL OR phase3_end_date < '2023-01-01');
DELETE FROM project_timeline WHERE project_id = 123 AND phase_id = 2;
DELETE FROM project_management WHERE project_name = 'Project X' AND budget > 10000;
DELETE FROM team_members WHERE project_id = 5 AND role = 'Developer';
DELETE FROM team_members WHERE specialization = 'Research' AND project_id = 3;
DELETE FROM TaskComments WHERE commenter_name = 'John Doe';
